data.name: ArcheAge: Steam Bloodsong Pack
data.detailed_description:
Heed the Bloodsong’s call! This pack is filled with an assortment of goods sure to please even the pickiest heroes!

  • 30-Day Patron Access - Grants 20% more EXP, work 20% faster, own land, and more!

  • Bound Tax Certificate (x150) - Use to pay taxes on land

  • Bound Worker’s Compensation: 1000 (x5) - Grants 1000 labor

  • Bound Red Regrade Charm - Increases your chance to regrade Unique or lower items

  • Bound Skillsaver Pendant - Unlocks an extra skill spec slot to quickly change between skillsets

  • Bound Anywhere Warehouse - Grants access your Warehouse anytime, anywhere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Win7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must have at least 1024MB video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Registered Trion Account, Glyph Client, and acceptance of License and Usage terms
